## Exploratory behaviour in red knots

- Wintering knots: consistent differences in exploratory behaviour [@bijleveld_personality_2014]

```{r include=FALSE}
source("libs.R");load("knots_data/distance_matrix.rdata")
source("ggplot.pub_geese.r")
library(readxl); library(viridis)
```

```{r load_behav_data, include=FALSE}
#'load the beahvioural scores from the excel file sheet 4
library(readxl)
k2.behav = read_excel("knots_data/eva-tagnr toa sept15.xlsx", sheet = 4) %>% mutate(id = as.character(tagnr), exp = as.numeric(exp))
```

```{r plot, echo=FALSE, fig.height= 2.5, fig.width= 3}
ggplot(k2.behav)+
  geom_histogram(aes(x = exp), fill = "black", colour = "transparent", bins = 15)+
  theme_pub()+
  labs(list(x = "exploratory score", title = "Mean exploratory score", caption = "From Eva Kok, COS-NIOZ, 2017"))
```
